channel.title: 459 server and client stuff <---------- READ PLEASE
channel.description:
Ok hi, Umm, I was interrested when i finaly saw a client that worth working and i think its the most useful client + server will be cus they are like what the rs old players want in the rsps and that stuff on (459) (witch got the old stuff + construction together) i downloaded the CLient+ Server i tested it and it was cool, but the problem i searched everywhere about tuts how to code in these stuff and how to add like skills working and how to make npcs work... and all that stuff , i couldnt find any tut and since its diff than the 317 i used to work on all the time in the past... i understanded a sht where to start and where to add.... so All im asking is please to make 459 server tuts and make some rsps's if you want cus it will lead alot of people to your servers...=] and dont need client tuts cus im not client editing things... just Wanted to make the 459 like anyother 317 server with tuts and downloads and all , thank you i hope you listen from me XD(or just help me making 459 server then i release =] i want to learn first XP)
so Thanks if you help or not, -Anan. :cool:

item.description:
@CarScape wrote:

Ok hi,
Umm, I was interrested when i finaly saw a client that worth working and i think its the most useful client + server will be cus they are like what the rs old players want in the rsps and that stuff on (459) (witch got the old stuff + construction together)
i downloaded the CLient+ Server i tested it and it was cool, but the problem i searched everywhere about tuts how to code in these stuff and how to add like skills working and how to make npcs work… and all that stuff , i couldnt find any tut and since its diff than the 317 i used to work on all the time in the past… i understanded a sht where to start and where to add… so All im asking is please
to make 459 server tuts and make some rsps’s if you want cus it will lead alot of people to your servers…=] and dont need client tuts cus im not client editing things… just Wanted to make the 459 like anyother 317 server with tuts and downloads and all , thank you i hope you listen from me XD(or just help me making 459 server then i release =] i want to learn first XP)

so Thanks if you help or not,
-Anan.
